entry.title: Contribution
entry.summary: The speaker is addressing bitcoin developers and mentions that they work at lbry.io. They want to discuss a potential contribution involving base_blob and/or base_uint being derived from std::array to enable move semantics, as well as uint160, uint256, and COutPoint. The speaker also raises concerns about acquiring/releasing recursive mutex in a loop, providing a code snippet from minig.cpp. The snippet involves creating a new block using BlockAssembler and ProcessNewBlock functions.
